About Me

Hello! I'm a passionate web developer with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I enjoy creating responsive, user-friendly websites and applications that solve real-world problems.

With a background in computer science and several years of hands-on experience, I approach each project with creativity and attention to detail. I'm constantly learning new technologies and techniques to enhance my skills.

When I'm not coding, you can find me hiking, reading tech blogs, or experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen.
